episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1101_0100_2:
One day, Trista asked Sophocles and Penny to
upgrade a machine in the Pokémon Center.
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_0200_1:
So, we need to add user-friendly functions for
people to use while they’re waiting...
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_0300_1:
I’m gonna use ALL the knowledge I gained from
my inventions to come up with great ideas!
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_0400_1: Hmmm...so, what functions should we add?
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_0500_1:
Maybe we could implement a feature where
people can view info about other Trainers
or Pokémon?
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_0600_1:
Hey, that’s a great idea! We could even make it
a bit like a Pokédex and add something like...
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_0800_1:
I’m totally blanking on a UI that’d vibe well with
a Pokémon Center...
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_0900_1: Oh, looks like you might need some help, Penny.
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_1300_1: Could we get your advice on something, Mr. Jacq?
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_1600_1:
If you go with that design, the machine would be
accessible to everyone!
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_1700_1: Thank you, Mr. Jacq. You were a big help!
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_1800_1:
Nah, I didn’t do anything special! It’s your hard
work that sparked this great idea.
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_1900_1: Well then, good luck you two!
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_2000_1:
Now, all we need to do is upgrade the hardware
to accommodate the new features...
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_2100_1:
I really want this to work...especially since it’s
something we came up with together.
episode_event_gadgeteer/4001_1001_2300_1: This is a lot harder than I thought it’d be...
episode_event_gadgeteer/4002_1001_0300_1:
Yeah, he knows a lot about machines and science
for a guy his age...
episode_event_gadgeteer/4002_1001_0500_1: Are you tinkering with that machine?
episode_event_gadgeteer/4002_1001_0700_1: But it’s not working the way we want it to...
episode_event_gadgeteer/4002_1001_1200_1: To put it simply, your design is overcomplicated.
episode_event_gadgeteer/4002_1001_1300_1: To start, this component is wholly unnecessary.
episode_event_gadgeteer/4002_1001_1400_1:
Simplification of the connection method is also
recommended. It should function properly after
these adjustments are made.
episode_event_gadgeteer/4002_1001_1600_1: Ahhh... OK, I get it now...
episode_event_gadgeteer/4002_1001_1700_1: We may have been overthinking it, huh?
episode_event_gadgeteer/4002_1001_1800_1: Why are you helping us, anyway?
episode_event_gadgeteer/4002_1001_1900_1:
...I simply cannot stand to see something
incomplete.
episode_event_gadgeteer/4002_1001_2100_1:
OK, now all that’s left are the final touches!
We...can do this!
